name: William KLEINICKE, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Kleinicke v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

judges: Justice BALDWIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: William KLEINICKE, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of February, 2006, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Justice BALDWIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
891 A.2d 727
William KLEINICKE, Appellant v. The PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
